code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{ThemeContext}from'../contexts/ThemeContext';import{Sun,Moon,Monitor}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeToggle=()=>{const{theme,setTheme}=useContext(ThemeContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dropdown dropdown-end",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{tabIndex:0,role:"button",className:"btn btn-ghost btn-square",children:[theme==='light'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sun,{}),theme==='dark'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Moon,{}),theme==='system'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Monitor,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{tabIndex:0,className:"dropdown-content menu bg-base-100 rounded-box z-[1] w-52 p-2 shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"w-full text-left",onClick:()=>setTheme('light'),children:"Light"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"w-full text-left",onClick:()=>setTheme('dark'),children:"Dark"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"w-full text-left",onClick:()=>setTheme('system'),children:"System"})})]})]});};export default ThemeToggle;
